description:
Download videos from almost any website worldwide

Download videos from almost any website worldwide
Best-in-class UI interface - Clean, intuitive, and powerful
Built with Electron, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

‚ú® Core Features
üåç Global Video Download Support
- 1000+ Sites Supported - Download videos from almost any website worldwide through yt-dlp engine
- Smart Platform Detection - Automatically detect video platforms and optimize download parameters
- Multi-format Support - Videos, audio tracks, playlists to meet all download needs
- Localized interface support in many languages
üé® Best-in-class UI Experience
- Modern Design - Clean and beautiful interface
- Intuitive Operations - One-click pause/resume/retry
- Real-time Progress - Detailed download progress tracking and status management
- Theme Switching - Support for system/light/dark themes for comfortable viewing
What's Changed
- feat(extension): refine error UI and branding by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/89
- feat(download): refine download workflow and UI by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/88
- fix(download): guard bilibili subtitle embed by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/90
- feat(subscriptions): follow one-click defaults by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/91
- fix(renderer): refine subscriptions layout by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/92
- fix(subscriptions): update rsshub docs link by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/97
- fix(renderer): disable text selection by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/98
- fix(settings): disable embed thumbnail by default by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/99
- fix(i18n): fill missing locale translations by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/100
- fix(subscriptions): add horizontal tab scroll by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/93
- feat(download): enrich error feedback links by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/101
Full Changelog: https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/compare/v1.1.10...v1.1.11
